messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 rodents have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Genetics Lab.
